channel.title: Keno San Pablo
channel.description: Recent content on Keno San Pablo

item.title: Pillars of Eternity II : Deadfire
item.description: Pursue a rogue god over land and sea in the sequel to the multi-award-winning RPG Pillars of Eternity. Captain your ship on a dangerous voyage of discovery across the vast unexplored archipelago region of the Deadfire. Steam PC and Mac

item.title: Pathfinder Adventures
item.description: Pathfinder Adventures translates the best-selling Pathfinder Adventure Card Game into an entirely new breed of digital card game, where players adventure collaboratively to battle monsters and villains, and acquire new feats, items, weapons, and allies. Google Play Itunes Steam PC and Mac Description of Work Integrating the game’s online precence. Playfab In game purchases
